com.cloudant.sync.replication

Class PeriodicReplicationReceiver<T extends PeriodicReplicationService>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.support.v4.content.WakefulBroadcastReceiver
        • com.cloudant.sync.replication.PeriodicReplicationReceiver<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The PeriodicReplicationService component triggered by this BroadcastReceiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WifiPeriodicReplicationReceiver

    public class PeriodicReplicationReceiver<T extends PeriodicReplicationService>
extends android.support.v4.content.WakefulBroadcastReceiver

    This class implements a WakefulBroadcastReceiver that handles events related to periodic replication. It responds to reboot of the device to trigger the resetting of the AlarmManager used to trigger periodic replication, and it handles the periodic alarms sent by the AlarmManager to trigger the periodic replications.

    The resetting of periodic alarms after reboot and the handling of the periodic alarms are delegated to the PeriodicReplicationService associated with this BroadcastReceiver.
